Dictionary.Name: The Collaborative International Dictionary of English v.0.44

Definition.WordDefinition: Diner \Din"er\, n. One who dines. [1913 Webster]

diner n 1: a person eating a meal (especially in a restaurant) 2: a passenger car where food is served in transit [syn: {dining car}, {dining compartment}, {buffet car}] 3: a restaurant that resembles a dining car
